casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 7, 2010

[Cite as 09107/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-4213.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1565. Mercer Dev., L.P. v. Mercer Cty. Bd. of Elections.

Mercer App. No. 10-10-08, 2010-0hio-4071. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay/injunction of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.

Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent.
